dcterms:description: A dataset developed to benchmark LLMs’ medical coaching efficacy, facilitating the development of communicative medical coaching tools for early-career doctors. It comprises 3,500 conversations with 13,666 utterances, based on real-world medical consultations from the MedDialog dataset.
dcterms:title: ChatCoach Dataset
mls:task: Detection of Medical Terminology Usage Errors
Correction of Medical Terminology Usage Errors

dcterms:creator: Xuehai He
Shu Chen
Zeqian Ju
Xiangyu Dong
Hongchao Fang
Sicheng Wang
Yue Yang
Jiaqi Zeng
Ruisi Zhang
Ruoyu Zhang
dcterms:description: A corpus of real-world medical consultations used to generate training data for fine-tuning open-source Large Language Models (LLMs). It serves as a primary source for patient queries in the ChatCoach framework.
dcterms:title: MedDialog Dataset

dcterms:description: A database containing comprehensive disease-related information, including symptoms, diagnostic tests, treatments, and medications, used as a source for generating training data in the ChatCoach framework.
dcterms:title: Disease Database

dcterms:description: A human-annotated testing dataset compiled to rigorously evaluate LLM’s performance in medical coaching, focusing on the detection and correction of medical terminology misuse.
dcterms:title: Human-Annotated Testing Dataset
